entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:36 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:36 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
